```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(xtable)
library(lmerTest)
```

# Load data
```{r}
RT_data <- read_csv(here('data/processed_data/processed_RTdata.csv'))
```

# Model 
```{r}
model <- lmer('log(rt) ~ trial_number*item_type*trial_complexity  + (trial_complexity*item_type*trial_number|subject)', data=RT_data, REML=FALSE)

xtable(summary(model)$coefficients)

plot(model)
qqnorm(residuals(model))
qqline(residuals(model))

```
